dc:title: Day After Day - May 1935
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes house cleaning in preparation for Easter. Catholic workers promulgated Catholic social principles in leaflets and speaking in Union Square at a Communist rally. Notes the work of priests with men on the bowery.
